### Hotel Accommodation Services
#### Notice Type: Advance Contract Award Notice

The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) requires a hotel accommodation service for its staff in the Southern Ontario region. The required accommodations will cater to surge capacity resource needs as outlined in the [Tender Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31836/1000464308---acan-en.pdf) document.

**Key Details**

* **Notice Reference**: cb-461-46107247
* **Solicitation Number**: 1000464308
* **Publication Date**: February 13, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 28, 2024, 14:00:00 EST
* **Contract Period**: Expected Contract Start Date: None; Expected Contract End Date: None
* **Estimated Value**: Not disclosed
* **Location**: Ontario, Canada (excluding the National Capital Region)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except NCR)
* **Trade Agreements**: The notice is open to participants under various Free Trade Agreements (FTAs), including:
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

**Contact Information**

Yuqiao Hu
yuqiao.hu@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca
(343) 551-8763
